flashmodes: Auto, Flash Off, Flash On, Auto + Redeye
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Multi-Area, Tracking, Single, Face Detection
whitebalancing: White Balance Presets (4), Custom White Balance
imageformat: JPG (EXIF 2.3), DCF 2.0, DPOF ( Good, Better & Best Quality )
